scripts.dev: clear && concurrently "cd backend && npm run dev" "cd frontend2 && npm run dev"
scripts.install: clear && npm install && concurrently "cd backend && npm install" "cd frontend2 && npm run install"
scripts.auth:generate: cd backend && npx @better-auth/cli@latest generate --output src/database/auth-schema.ts --config src/lib/auth.ts
scripts.db:setup: cd backend && npx drizzle-kit generate && npx drizzle-kit migrate
